SA10n1037:5: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ ||2 ||
SA10n1037:8: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati |
SA10n1037:9: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit ||4 ||
SA10n1037:10: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā |
SA10n1037:15: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate ||7 ||
SA10n1037:18: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1037:24: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1037:27: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ ||13 ||
SA10n1037:29: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ ||14 ||
SA10n1037:30: yena gṛṇhāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate |
SA10n1037:32: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā |
SA10n1037:40: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate |
SA10n1037:42: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate |
SA10n1037:43: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ ||21 ||
SA10n1037:44: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate |
SA10n1037:45: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate ||22 ||
SA10n1037:48: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit |
SA10n1037:49: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati ||24 ||
